title: Marguerite
writer: Marcia Romano (collaborating writer), Xavier Giannoli (dialogue), Xavier Giannoli (screenplay)
actors: Catherine Frot, André Marcon, Michel Fau, Christa Théret
plot: Paris, 1920s. Marguerite Dumont is a wealthy woman, lover of the music and the opera. She loves to sing for her friends, although she's not a good singer. Both her friends and her husband ...
